CustomField.formula:
IF(Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c = 0, "Not Estimated", IF(Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c <= 5, "Very Small", IF((Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c > 5 && Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c <= 10), "Small", IF((Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c > 10 && Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c <= 15), "Medium", IF((Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c > 15 && Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c <= 20), "Large", IF((Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c > 20 && Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c <= 30), "X-Large", IF((Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c > 30 && Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c <= 40), "XX-Large", IF(Feature_T_Shirt_Value_Roll_Up__c > 40, "XXX-Large",
"ERROR"))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Aggregated T-Shirt Size based on Related User Stories
CustomField.label: Feature T-Shirt Size (Roll-Up)
